author: mrodozov
body:
Skip virtual memory limitation with ulimit on Arm. I can't say what was this limitation purpose

#### PR description:

Fixes this unit test
https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/slc7_aarch64_gcc820/CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-09-16-2300/unitTestLogs/DQMServices/Demo

#### PR validation:

The test runs on arm. See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31123#issuecomment-694163544
title: Fix TestDQMServicesDemo for Arm
